content.text: Learn how to create a "card" with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a "card" with CSS.

content.code:
John Doe

   

Architect & Engineer
content.code_html:
<div class="card">
  <img src="img_avatar.png" alt="Avatar" style="width:100%">
  <div class="container">
    <h4><b>John Doe</b></h4>
    <p>Architect & Engineer</p>
  </div>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* Add shadows to create the "card" effect */  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    
transition: 0.3s;
/* Add shadows to create the "card" effect */
/* On mouse-over, add a deeper shadow */
/* Add some padding inside the card container */

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Add shadows to create the "card" effect */  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    
transition: 0.3s;
/* Add shadows to create the "card" effect */
/* On mouse-over, add a deeper shadow */
/* Add some padding inside the card container */

content.code_html:
.card {
  /* Add shadows to create the "card" effect */
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  transition: 0.3s;
}

/* On mouse-over, add a deeper shadow */
.card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 8px 16px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

/* Add some padding inside the card container */
.container {
  padding: 2px 16px;
}

.card {  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);  transition: 0.3s;  border-radius: 5px; /* 5px rounded corners */}/* Add rounded corners to the top left and the top right corner of the image */img {
    
border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;}

content.code_html:
.card {
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  transition: 0.3s;
  border-radius: 5px; /* 5px rounded corners */
}

/* Add rounded corners to the top left and the top right corner of the image */
img {
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
}
